price: 37. Mise waxay hayaan khasnadaha Rabbigaa? Mise waxaa la siiyey awood dhan (mayee waa kuwo tabar daran, liita)?
arabic: أَمۡ عِندَهُمۡ خَزَآئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡمُصَۜيۡطِرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: am ʿindahum khazāinu rabbika am humu al-muṣayṭirūna
